name: AS_GCM_BL_usageFilterForClauseSetClauseRecord
description: Usage filter for Clause set Clause Record
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!refData: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
    records: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getRefData(
      refTypes: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_USAGE,
      doCastToCdt: false
    ),
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
    value: {
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_APPLICABLE,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_OPTIONAL,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_REQUIRED
    }
  ),
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterList"(
    name: "",
    options: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!refData,
      expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterListOption"(
        id: fv!item[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId],
        name: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          bundle: local!bundle,
          bundleKey: fv!item[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refKey]
        ),
        filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refUsageId,
          operator: "=",
          value: fv!item[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId]
        )
      )
    ),
    allowMultipleSelections: true
  )
)
